entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean-up CODEOWNERS file #40739

Closed

  • Unexpected Build Cache Invalidation #38935
    Discussion
  • Workload packages that are unlisted can't be installed #40440
    8.0.4xx
  • SDK resolver does not work with snap installations of SDK on Linux #10403
    Backlog
  • Overload resolution ambiguity introduced by SDK 8.0.300-preview.24203.14 #40235

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40752
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unused files #40750
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Define run tests timeout for UB/SB CI #40749
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #40745
    Area-Infrastructure, source-build, untriaged
  • Cleanup snap artifacts #40744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/content/repo-projects/installer.proj #40742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Add RazorWarningLevel #40720
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add musl and arm64 prebuilts #40743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit installing unlisted Fixes #40440 #40534
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Restructure test assets and baselines #40746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sync the VMR from sdk into dotnet/dotnet main #40724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update src source build content #40719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add preview VS note to developer guide #40542
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2447145 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Accept it if the versions from different sets are equal #40485
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove the 7.0 template packages #40710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
